name: spirit-shackle
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Traps the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.
